name: Robot Head
description:
We are two university students who try to make games, we are working with unity for a year. This is our first ludum dare game and our first game we made together.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/robot-head

In Robot Head the goal is finding your body parts and escaping the tower.

[A-S] Movement

[Space] Jump

[Left Mouse Button] Fire

*Moving and shooting consumes your power.

*You can consume enemies' power by shooting them.

*Platforms have different power levels, Use them wisely.
